title: Et cetera. Season 2. Episode 7 [The State Library. Melbourne Cup handover. Tumbarumba]
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Social life and customs
abstract: Northern Access Telelvision production featuring a visit to the State Library of Victoria, the handover of the Melbourne Cup to the VRC and interview with percussion group "Tumbarumba"
description: Northern Access Television produced this episode of the series "Et cetera" featuring a visit to the State Library of Victoria and an interview with Melinda Dundas - Public Affairs Officer, who talks of the services available to residents and tourists, and multicultural, regional and youth oriented initiatives. Interviewer Suzana Talevski also speaks to Librarian Des Cawley. Justine Isard reports from the Windsor Hotel where the handover of the Melbourne Cup by the Hardy Brothers to the Victorian Racing Club (VRC) is taking place. Includes footage of the cup's production. Phillip Taylor speaks to percussion group Tumbarumba. Presented by David McLauchlan.
